## GAD-7 vs DAWBA

GAD-7 vs DAWBA: A Harmonious Comparison Psychologists and social scientists often face the challenge of efficiently matching items in different questionnaires like the Generalized Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) and the Development and Wellbeing Assessment (DAWBA). This process, known as harmonisation, can be a time-consuming and arduous task, thereby hampering productivity. Harmony, a state-of-the-art software solution, offers a promising solution to this predicament. By leveraging advanced natural language processing and generative AI models, **GAD-7 vs DAWBA** comparisons are much more efficient and objective, significantly reducing the time and efforts invested by researchers. Harmony emerges as a game-changer especially amidst the sea of longitudinal studies and cohort researches. The ability to compare a multitude of studies both within and across, with an enviable ease, ramps up the overall research output. In the **GAD-7 vs DAWBA** scenario, Harmony uses large language models to quantify the degree of similarity between corresponding items in the questionnaires. As a result, researchers can comprehend the intersection of issues covered in both the questionnaires, enabling a thorough understanding of their analytical results. Given the multilingual capabilities of Harmony, the **GAD-7 vs DAWBA** comparison can be rendered easily regardless of the linguistic barriers. This serves as a fantastic opportunity for psychologists and researchers to enrich their insights from a global perspective. Not to mention, accessibility to the web interface via [Harmony](https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app) paves the way to a seamless user experience. So why wait? Embrace Harmony and transcend traditional questionnaire analysis!

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and DAWBA

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and DAWBA into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just DAWBA into Harmony</a> - compare DAWBA with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
